job.title: Sr. Software Developer (.NET)
job.description:
Headquartered in Arizona, we are a leading irrigation product development company that caters to residential and commercial customers all over the world. Currently, we are looking to expand our team in San Diego, CA and are looking for a strong Sr. Software Engineer with experience in .NET, C#, ASP.NET MVC, WinForms, and Web Development.
What You Will Be Doing
The Senior Software Engineer will be responsible for the design and implementation of a multi-user Web-based software product.
Design of software for central control of networked irrigation systems in geographically diverse areas
Design and development of advanced irrigation control algorithms and methods
Development of virtualized cloud systems for centralizing control of multiple irrigation sites located around the world
Development of both cloud-based systems and customer hosted systems using Windows IIS
Development of .NET business objects to fulfill product requirements and Unit Tests to validate the business logic
Work with the Quality Assurance group to identify and fix defects
What You Need for this Position
Must-Have Skills
BSCS, BSEE, or equivalent from an accredited university
Proficient with C#, .NET, ASP.NET MVC, and Windows Forms
5+ years of software engineering experience including experience with Web development, Windows user interface implementation, service development, and Internet communication technologies
Demonstrated on-time delivery of commercial software systems
Stable work history
Nice-to-have's
Angular 2+
WCF, SOA, and SQL Server
Experience with Perforce
NUnit or other Unit Testing experience
Cloud Development experience
Experience with writing Windows code for communication interfaces with embedded firmware systems
What's In It for You
Competitive Salary (DOE)
Bonus
Excellent benefits package
401K w/ match
PTO
Paid Holidays
So, if you are a Sr. Software Engineer with .NET/C# expertise, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Ashley.Upchurch@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : RH1-1602634 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Ashley Upchurch - Lead Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
